data.title: Identify your iPad model
data.meta_description: Find out which iPad model you have.
data.text:
Find out which iPad model you have.

Find the model number

Use the model number to find out which model iPad you have. You can find the model number in two ways:

iPad Pro 13-inch (M4)

Year: 2024

Capacity: 256 GB, 512 GB, 1 TB, 2 TB

Model number (on the back cover):

A2925 on iPad Pro 13-inch (M4) Wi-Fi

A2926 on iPad Pro 13-inch (M4) Wi-Fi + Cellular

A3007 on iPad Pro 13-inch (M4) Wi-Fi + Cellular (China mainland only)

Black front bezel

Ultra Retina XDR display

Nano-texture display glass option on 1 TB and 2 TB models

No nano-SIM tray, eSIM only

Cameras:

Front: Ultra Wide on landscape edge

Back: Wide

LiDAR Scanner

Face ID sensor

Rear-facing ambient light sensor

See the tech specs for iPad Pro 13-inch (M4).

Year: 2024

Capacity: 256 GB, 512 GB, 1 TB, 2 TB

Model number (on the back cover):
